summary: Implements the ConvNeXt V2 neural network backbone, encapsulating the architecture, layer configuration, and forward pass logic required to extract hierarchical visual features from input images.
business_intent: Offers a ready-to-use ConvNeXt V2 feature extractor for computer‑vision applications such as image classification, object detection, and segmentation, enabling developers to leverage a state‑of‑the‑art CNN without building the model from scratch.
